import "./post.css" import {MoreVert} from "@material-ui/icons" import { Users } from "../../dummyData"; export default function Post({post}) { const [like, setLike] = useState(post.like) return (
u.id===post.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" /> {Users.filter(u=>u.id===post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{post.like} likes
{post.comment} comment
) }
